scalable liliExperience working with many different teams as these teams interface with nearly hundreds of othersliulpbrppstrongDaytoDaystrongppThe Experience Orchestration Services team builds the APIs that deliver the content discovery experience for all of this leading entertainment companies clients We implement reliable hightraffic services that power this companies Streamings user experiences across web mobile and living room devices We are looking for a software engineer who wants to build and operate these critical services that support all of this companies Streaming usersppbrppResource will be responsible for crafting systems that orchestrate and deliver content at scale  ultimately powering this companies Streaming clients running on smart TVs smartphones gaming consoles FireTV Apple TV Roku and others This group is part of content delivery team a combination of Disney  Hulu and Star Plus  delivering the browse experience From the home page to details page they deliver all the content on the screen making sure this is always available For live events they take on the bulk of all the traffic optimizing for scale for over 350 million subscribers ppbrppThese teams are building new services and some of the team will be responsible for inspecting designing and building out implementation plans for new microservices that add capabilities to delivery platform They are working towards a broader initiative unifying all platforms This team is the tip of the spear on this initiative They are responsible for driving towards a unified platform for product experiences This is cutting edge in terms of what companies are doing and a very ambitious goal This is an excellent opportunity to work on a very visible team with lots of exposure  often Clevel executives are on calls and involved with this teams workppnbspp
